msbt.message: Huh? Hey, you're not from here, are you? Yeah, definitely not. I would've met someone as buff as you by now! I'm . I actually just moved to .Seems like the universe is trying to tell us something It's probably saying, "Work out together!"

Yo! You visiting the island?I'm ! I just moved here today, so I'm still taking in that new jogging-route smell!I'd love to go on a run with you and show you around, but I'd probably just get us lost, .Next time, I'll give you a proper tour. Sorry I can't be more help right now.
Huh? Are you from another island?My name's . You might know me as the legend from . What kind of legend? Well, I once did push-ups with a kitten asleep on my back. Pretty cool, huh!

Oh? A new face! Are you visiting from another island?My name's ! You're? Cool.I just moved here a little while ago, so I'm still figuring out all the best boulders to lift, .Hey, if you see any cool boulders, let me know about 'em next time you're on , OK?

Hey, you're visiting from off-island, right? My name's . Nice to meet you!I just moved here myself, so my tour guide muscles aren't quite there yet, .It's so awesome to see visitors. I love how popular this place is!

<10_14 arg="20" />HEEEEEYAAAAA!<10_9 />Heh heh, did I scare ya? My bad. Sometimes I get a little too pumped up. And then I get a little too loud. You're here visiting, right? That's so cool! My name's !I'm kinda new here, but I'd love to have an off-island workout buddy.
